text.name: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial?
This boat needs firewood to repair.
This boat requires duct tape to repair.
You can repair this boat with the firewood you have.
You can repair this boat with some duct tape you have.
The boat is repaired, are you ready to go to the next island? You can't go back.
Supplies will be dropped after the video ad.
"Hi! Want to trade? Here's what I have:"
The boxes can contain anything from food to weapons.
Billy "Red" To unlock: Kill 5 zombies with any shotgun. At any difficulty.
Emilio "Doc" To unlock: Stop bleeding 6 times. At any difficulty.
Dave "The Boxer" To unlock: Kill 10 zombies with your bare hands. At any difficulty.
Lee "Maniac" Kill the remaining bandit with any axe. On the difficulty level "Experienced" or "Veteran".
Sergey "Slav" To unlock: Kill 3 other survivors in one life. On the difficulty level "Experienced" or "Veteran".
John "Biker" To unlock: Equip the Biker Jacket, Motorcycle Helmet, and Wrench at the same time. On Experienced or Veteran difficulty.
Ganzo "Dragon" To unlock: Kill 4 surviving enemies armed with firearms. On Veteran difficulty.
Tom "The Survivor" To unlock: Survive for 7 days. On Veteran difficulty level.
Harry "The Veteran" To unlock: Equip the Gorka set (pants, jacket, helmet) at the same time. On Veteran difficulty.
Survivor 1 Basic equipment: jeans, T-shirt. Unlocked Skills: None
Survivor 2 Basic equipment: jeans, T-shirt. Unlocked Skills: None
Survivor 3 Basic equipment: jeans, T-shirt. Unlocked Skills: None
Billy "Red" Basic equipment: jeans, T-shirt, bandana. Unlocked skills: Sniper.
Emilio "Doc" Initial equipment: medic pants, T-shirt, bandages. Unlocked Skills: Red+
Dave "The Boxer" Basic equipment: jeans, T-shirt, rags. Unlocked Skills: Blocker.
Lee "Maniac" Initial equipment: jeans, dress, gas mask, butcher knife. Unlocked Skills: Sweet Home
John "Biker" Starting Equipment: Biker Jacket, Motorcycle Helmet, Adjustable Wrench. Unlocked Skills: Sprinter. 「☆ Unique Skill: All motorcycle helmets you find have increased durability.」
Sergey "Slav" Starting Equipment: Sweatpants, Sports Jacket, Ski Mask, Baseball Bat. Unlocked Skills: Thresher. 「☆ Unique Skill: Constantly increases temperature by +1.」

Ganzo "Dragon" Starting equipment: hunting pants, bow, 5 composite arrows. Unlocked skills: Sprinter, Snowmobile. 「☆ Unique Skill: All katanas you find have increased durability. When you equip a katana, you are faster.」
Tom "The Survivor" Starting equipment: jeans, t-shirt, cowboy hat, hunting knife, bag. Unlocked skills: Hunter, Survivalist.
Harry "The Veteran" Starting gear: jeans, t-shirt, cap, bulletproof vest, Colt 1911, ammo. Unlocked skills: Sniper, Scout.
No connection to the air supply center! Please restore your internet connection.
No connection to the air supply center!
Use 1/2/3 bags of blood or saline
Kill 5/15/30 Infected with an Assault Rifle or SMG
Kill 5/15/30 Infected with a bow or crossbow
Survive 10/20/30 wounds from infected or wolves
Kill 5/15/30 Infected with a semi-automatic or bolt-action rifle.
Visit at least one city on 1/2/3 islands (levels)
Take no damage for 12/24/36 game hours

You can fight hand-to-hand with your bare hands or using melee weapons. Melee combat occurs automatically when you get close to an enemy. Each weapon has a different chance of causing triple damage or blocking an enemy's attack.
If you are using a ranged weapon, aiming is automatic. Shoot with the button. Shooting while running will reduce your weapon's accuracy.
The fire provides heat and light, and can be used to cook food. The fire can be used up to three times after construction.
You can grow plants that will provide you with food. You need seeds and a shovel, pitchfork or pickaxe to plant.
You will need resources to create items. You can find or collect them.
When you are injured, you may start bleeding. When you are bleeding, you constantly lose blood and cannot regain health. Use bandages or rags to stop the bleeding.

You can become sick if your temperature drops to 0% or, in rare cases, if you are attacked by the infected. Health regeneration does not work when sick. To recover, use tetracycline or keep your temperature, food and water intake above 75%.
Cold weather can cause temperatures to drop. Temperatures drop even more at night and during rain and snow.
You need to eat and drink to survive. Keep an eye on your hunger and thirst bars. If they drop below 50%, you won't be able to restore your health.
If your blood drops to zero, you die. You can lose blood by getting hit in melee combat or by bullets. You will also start losing blood if your heat/water/food stats drop to zero.
You can stop the bleeding with bandages or rags (some types of clothing can be torn into rags).
Use blood and saline bags to restore blood.
If your water, food and heat levels rise above 50%, you will begin to regenerate blood.
Take shelter in buildings to keep heat.
Find heat clothes in good condition to keep you heat.
You can also heat up if you drink whiskey.
Light a fire to keep heat.
Find and set up a tent to get some shelter from the rain and heat up a bit.
Most of the loot is found in buildings.
Loot can also be found in car trunks.
You can find edible berries on some bushes.
You can chop down trees with an axe. Different types of trees provide different resources.
Find a headlamp or night vision goggles to light the way at night (batteries required).
Flares can illuminate a small area for a short period after they are thrown.
A fire can also illuminate an area for a longer period at night.
Water pumps can contain drinking water. You can drink from them, but keep in mind that the water is limited.
You can also use a water pump to fill bottles and flasks.
Duct tape improves the durability of some equipment by 15%.
The Sewing Kit improves the durability of some gear by 50%.
The cleaning kit improves the durability of your firearm by 25%.
You can find deer near water or in forests. They are cautious, so you need a ranged weapon to hunt them.
If you have shot a deer, you can skin it with a knife to get steaks.
Steaks can be cooked over a campfire.
Homemade Bag + 3 Wooden Sticks = Homemade Backpack (5 slots)
Firewood + rags/wooden sticks/paper = fire pit kit
Place the fire kit on the ground and light it with matches.
The map will be available after training.

You can use boats to move from one island to another. But first, the boat needs to be repaired (use wood or tape). You can visit many islands, but be careful! Once you reach another island, you will not be able to return to the previous one.
You can set up camping tents and use them to keep heat and store items. Items are stored in them permanently.
Erected barriers and barbed wire can slow down enemies if they attack.
Sniper Lvl 1: Increases headshot chance with ranged weapons by 10%. Lv. 2: Increases headshot damage by 30%.
Scout Lvl 1: You can detect other people from a greater distance. Lv. 2: You can detect other people's hostility from a greater distance.
God's gift Lv. 1: Notes are given to your inventory. Lv. 2: Gain a weapon storage box and a sewing kit (tailor).
Camel Lvl 1: Thirst onset is slowed by 10%. Lvl 2: All canned drinks provide an additional +10 Water when used.
Hamster Lvl 1: Hunger progression slows by 10%. Lv. 2: All canned food gives an additional +10 food when used.
Snowman Lvl 1: Rain and snowfall reduce heat twice as slowly. Lv. 2: Permanent +2 bonus to heat.
Lead Farmer Lvl 1: All ranged weapons found will contain ammo. Lv. 2: Each ammo pack you find contains 5 more rounds.
Master of Survival Lvl 1: Regeneration speed doubles if your blood drops below 50%. Lv. 2: +10% running speed when blood level drops below 20%.
Blocker Lvl 1: Increases the chance of blocking an enemy's melee attack by 5%. Lv. 2: Increases the chance of blocking an enemy's melee attack by 15%.
Thresher Lvl 1: Increases melee critical strike chance by 10%. Lv. 2: Increases critical attack damage by 30%.
Trunk Robber Lvl 1: Increases the chance of finding loot in car trunks by 20%. Lv. 2: Gives a 10% chance to find 2 items in one trunk at once.
Hunter Lvl 1: Less likely for animals to notice you. Lvl 2: Grants a 50% chance to get an extra steak when skinning animals.
Sweet home Lvl 1: Staying inside buildings provides 50% more heat. Lv. 2: While sleeping, the rate of thirst and hunger is slowed by 30%.
Empty Lv 1: Accelerates the removal of radiation from the body Lv 2: Slows down the rate of radiation growth
Vigilance Lvl 1: You can see camouflaged enemies better. Lv. 2: Bushes with berries and pillboxes are marked on the map near you.
Agronomist Lvl 1: 50% chance to find more wild berries from bushes. Lv. 2: 50% chance to find more fruits on plants you plant.
Repair this boat with firewood to move on. Chop down any tree with an axe to get firewood.
Hey! That looks like prey! Come closer to pick it up.
Here you can view all the items you have picked up.
This is a slot in your pocket. It is always available, even if you have no other equipment. Use items by touching them.
Welcome, survivor. You are trapped on a small island. Your only chance to reach another is to find a boat.
Select a motion control mode. You can switch between them at any time.
As long as you continue to survive and kill enemies, you will gain experience points (EP), which will allow you to unlock skills.
Select one of the skills and tap the plus button. It will always be active until your character dies.
Use the interact button to pick up items and interact with the environment.
Now that you have a ranged weapon, aiming will be automatic. Use this button to shoot.
You can reload your weapon by pressing this button. If you have the appropriate ammunition, it will be used.
Switch between melee and ranged combat modes.
It looks like you're bleeding. Find a bandage or rip your shirt into rags.
Your blood level has dropped to zero. Luckily for you, this is just training, so your health will now be restored. Continue.
Use drag and drop to manage items in your inventory.
Look, a firearm. Usually found at military installations.
There's an infected ahead! Attack him when you get close. The fight will start automatically.
Wolves! Quiet! Wolves are very dangerous, especially in packs.
Water pump. You can drink from it, and also fill your flask or bottle with water.
Abandoned car. You can search the trunk for loot. To do this, you need to get closer to the car.
You can hunt deer and skin them with a knife to obtain meat.
You can hunt rabbits and skin them with a knife to get meat.
You can pick berries from some bushes. Just look around.

To unlock achievements, you must play a full session until your character dies. There are 3 tiers: bronze for beginners, silver for experienced players, and gold for veterans. You can unlock lower tiers if you choose a higher difficulty level, but not vice versa. Higher tiers are also harder to unlock.
Are you sure you want to exit the game? You will lose all your training progress.
Are you sure you want to exit the game? Your game will be saved.
You can refuel this boat using the gas can you have.
You need a can of gasoline to fuel this boat.
Enter this bunker? You will be able to return back.
Leave this bunker? You can return to it later.
Supply delivery is not available underground.
Watch the ad to wake up.
Bunker is unavailable, please try again later.
You are about to die. The only chance to continue the game is to use adrenaline after watching the ad video.
An internet connection is required to continue.
Ammo Belt – Increases reload speed by 30%
RDS collimator sight – slightly reduces spread
Optical sights - reduce spread, +10% chance to hit the head
Hides the muzzle flash and muffles the noise of the shot.
Kate "The Tourist" Basic equipment: jeans, raincoat, camping tent, headlamp. Unlocked Skills: Hunter, Night Predator.
Jasmine "Lumberjack" Basic equipment: hunting pants, T-shirt, beret, hatchet, scotch tape. Unlocked skills: Hamster, Camel, Snowman.
Aika "Stringer" Initial equipment: jeans, T-shirt, cap, press vest, flask, radio. Unlocked skills: Sprinter, Scout.
Kate "The Tourist" To unlock: Find two working vehicles on the 4th island or further. On Veteran difficulty level.
Jasmine "Lumberjack" To unlock: Lower your Karma to -100, then raise it to +100 in one lifetime. On Veteran difficulty level.
Aika "Stringer" To unlock: Complete tasks from 3 other survivors in one life. On Veteran difficulty level.
Hello! Our group is looking for the following items:
As a reward you will receive:
Thank you very much! And here are the coordinates where you can find the reward.
There are no tasks at the moment.
Coordinates of the entrance to the underground bunker.
A group of survivors are looking for this item:
Hello! We need help! Bandits have set up camp not far from here. Get rid of them, and we will not remain in debt.
Did you find what we were looking for?
Boat coordinates on the east coast.
Hello! We were attacked and lost a crate with loot. If you return it to us, we will not remain in debt.
Deal with the bandits first, and then we'll talk.
Have you found our loot box?
Thank you very much! Here are the coordinates of the place where you will find the reward.
A group of survivors have lost a crate containing their loot. I can find it and return it to them, or I can open it and take the contents for myself.
A group of survivors asked me to deal with the bandits.
The bandits have been eliminated. I must return to the survivors for my reward.
The current task has been completed.
MAC-10 To unlock: Kill a total of 100 infected with any pistols. On the difficulty level "Experienced" or "Veteran". Current progress:
Saiga-12K To unlock: Kill a total of 150 infected with any shotgun. On the difficulty level "Experienced" or "Veteran". Текущий прогресс:
AUG To unlock: Kill a total of 200 infected with any assault rifles or SMGs. On the difficulty level "Experienced" or "Veteran". Current progress:
MAC-10 Unlocked. Where to find: Weapon shops, NATO vehicle crash sites, underground bunkers.
Saiga-12K Unlocked. Where to find: Weapon shops, underground bunkers, military bases.
AUG Unlocked. Where to find: NATO equipment crash sites, underground bunkers, military bases.
VSS To unlock: Find 6 helicopters shot down in one life. On Veteran difficulty level. Current status:
VSS Unlocked. Where to find: Underground bunkers, military bases of the Eastern Bloc.
SV-98 To unlock: Kill 200 infected with headshots from rifles (Mosin rifle, SKS, SVD, Repeater). On Veteran difficulty level. Current status:
SV-98 Unlocked. Where to find: Underground bunkers.
Call a friendly survivor for help? He'll arrive right after the commercial.
Press this button when you are ready for the next wave.
The area is clear, supplies have been dropped.
Get ready for the first wave.
Walk. After your character dies, you will find yourself back on the coast of the current island.
Radiation. Added radioactive zones to islands. Radiation can be cured.
Battle Royale: Adds shrinking "death zones" immediately after the game starts. Increases loot spawn rate.
Against all. All other survivors will start hunting you immediately after the game starts.
Shootout. Almost all zombies now have firearms.
Wildlife: Almost all zombies are replaced by wolves.
Breakthrough. Hold off the zombie onslaught for as long as possible.
You cannot unlock characters, weapons, or achievements while playing one of the modes.
Put the weapon in the case.
Hunger rate reduced by 50%, food bonus reduced by 66%, Health does not regenerate, health restoration items instantly restore a certain amount of health. Changing seasons in development...
I gained a lot of new knowledge!
I gained a lot of new knowledge!
For a second I felt immortal.
• Slow hunger and thirst. • heat weather • Reduced damage from enemies.
• Average rate of hunger and thirst. • Normal weather. • Normal damage to enemies.
• High rate of hunger and thirst. • Cold weather. • Increased damage from enemies. • A little more enemies.
• High rate of hunger and thirst. • Cold weather. • Increased damage from enemies. • Unexplored areas are hidden on the map.
Are you ready to go to the next island? You can't go back.
Are you ready to go to the next island? You can't go back.
Tarpaulin + Firewood = Build a Stash. Items left in the cache will not disappear. Enemies can destroy the cache if they find it.
Mike "Designer" To unlock: Reach the unknown island. On the Legend difficulty level.

Mike "Designer" Starting equipment: Ushanka, Cool hoodie, Work pants, Large capacity vest, Mountaineering backpack, Sword, DP-12, 12 gauge ammo x100. Unlocked skills: Sniper, Thresher, Sprinter, Scout.
Patch To unlock: Complete the game as one of these characters: Emilio "Doc", Billy "Red", Dave "Boxer".
Lighter To unlock: Complete the game as one of these characters: Lee "Maniac", Sergei "Slav", John "Biker".
Smoke grenade To unlock: Complete the game as one of these characters: Ganzo "The Dragon", Tom "The Survivor", Harry "The Veteran".
Laser Sight To unlock: Complete the game as one of these characters: Kate "Tourist", Jasmine "Lumberjack", Ike "Stringer".
Officer's key card. To unlock: Complete the game as one of these characters: Xavier "Pilot", Rudolf "Jager", Taman "GBR", Daria "Lab Assistant".
...Over! Over! We hear you! We're flying to you, we'll be there in a day, Hold on!...
Try to contact someone by radio?
Patch Where to find: Hospitals, Town Houses.
Lighter Where to find: Fire stations, garages.
Smoke grenade Where to find: Underground bunker, military bases.
Laser Sight Where to find: Underground bunker, military bases.
Officer's key card. Where to find: Infected military officers.
I need a fire, matches or a lighter.
I can't sleep, I might miss the helicopter.
I can't go there, I might miss the helicopter.
Nadya, we're flying east, to signal 4316.
I need to get back to the radio!
Are you ready to rise to the surface? There will be no turning back.
To open this door you need the Officer's Keycard.
For this you need a suitable plant.
Total blood loss -50%, Bleeding stops twice as fast
Landing consumes less strength Become more proficient in growing crops You can gain experience in planting plants
I used the AI-2 First Aid Kit
